full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA DE BZHIN GSHEGS PA'I GTZUG TOR NAS BYUNG BA'I GDUGS DKAR PO CAN GZHAN GYIS MI THUB PHYIR ZLOG PA CHEN MO MCHOG TU GRUB PA ZHES BYA BA'I GZUNGS BZHUGS SO, ,
